attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Honour the last member of the BEF who fought in the trenches during WW1. Both the French and Belgium Governments have shown their graditude to Harry Patch whilst this government, to use the words of an official, does not do things like that. It damned well should.If you can knight pop stars, why not someone who fought for this country?

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
